short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension used for testing AA and AAA Target Size WCAG 2.2

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Target Size (Minimum) WCAG 2.2 SC 2.5.8
Goal: Make controls easier to activate.
What it does: Ensure targets meet a minimum size or have sufficient spacing around them.
Why it's important: Some people with physical impairments cannot click small buttons that are close together.


This chrome extension sets the mouse cursor on all interactive content to a 24x24px box. 
Upon selecting the highlight focusable elements button, all targetable elements will be injected with a visible border for easier identification.
